quotes.quote: For safety is not a gadget but a state of mind.
The dangers of life are infinite, and among them is safety.
Safety is something that happens between your ears, not something you hold in your hands.
There is always safety in valor.
The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
Precaution is better than cure.
Safety's just danger, out of place.
Better a thousand times careful than once dead.
We must respect the past and mistrust the present if we wish to provide for the safety of the future.
The desire for safety stands against every great and noble enterprise.
Safety is a common denominator across all aspects of life, hence knowledge should always be shared. It is not a matter for industry it is a matter for humanity.

There's an old saying that if you think safety is expensive, try an accident. Accidents cost a lot of money. And, not only in damage to plant and in claims for injury, but also in the loss of the company's reputation.
Our insignificance is often the cause of our safety.
Safety from external danger is the most powerful director of national conduct.
A lot of the people who keep a gun at home for safety are the same ones who refuse to wear a seat belt.
One could not always put safety up front as the prime goal. Do that, and who would ever achieve anything of note?
Working safely is like breathing - if you don't, you die.
The safety and happiness of society are the objects at which all political institutions aim, and to which all such institutions must be sacrificed.
Insisting on perfect safety is for people who don't have the balls to live in the real world.
Choosing safety is a choice of life over career.
Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety.
He that's secure is not safe
It is never safe to look into the future with eyes of fear.
One can go back toward safety or forward toward growth.
Safety is from God alone.
Safety First is Safety Always.
Government's first duty and highest obligation is public safety.
It is better to be safe than sorry.
The best safety lies in fear.
